attributes.action: Reduce the amount of non renewable engry used in the uk by 30% by 2025
attributes.additional_details: The government should do this to help with the cost of living which is on a rapid rise it will also help the uk become a greener country
attributes.background: I want the government to spend more time, money and resources on making energy more affordable and more sustainable so that less people struggle and the uk becomes a better place.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Address the Energy, Climate and Environment crisis by investing in Renewables: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617729

Set a target for 70% of UK energy to be renewable by 2030: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612739
